content.question: The slaves who participated in the Stono rebellion in South Carolina in 1739 hoped to

choices.label: take over the colony and end slavery in it
return to Africa by commandeering boats
flee to Florida where the Spanish offered freedom
run away to join Maroon groups living in the backcountry
escape to the North where they would be free

content.answer: flee to Florida where the Spanish offered freedom

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
